channel.title: CVE Feed for Puppet -- mcollective-puppet-agent plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Puppet -- mcollective-puppet-agent plugin

item.title: CVE-2017-2290|2024-08-05T13:48:05.267Z -- puppet -- mcollective-puppet-agent%20plugin
item.description: On Windows installations of the mcollective-puppet-agent plugin, version 1.12.0, a non-administrator user can create an executable that will be executed with administrator privileges on the next "mco puppet" run. Puppet Enterprise users are not affected. This is resolved in mcollective-puppet-agent 1.12.1.
